nodes.snippet: We are not even into February and the cost of illegal immigration so far this year is $18,959,495,168.
"We are not even into February and the cost of illegal immigration so far this year is $18,959,495,168.

But both numbers can only be estimates; there is no actual count of undocumented immigrants, and there is a big dispute over what kind of financial drain, if any, illegal immigration places on the United States.. .
“There are at least 25,772,342 illegal aliens, not the 11,000,000 that have been reported for years, in our Country.
